remarks: Disjunction distributes over the biconditional, for a decidable proposition.  Based on an axiom of system DS in Vladimir Lifschitz, "On calculational proofs" (1998), ~ http://citeseerx.ist.psu.edu/viewdoc/summary?doi=10.1.1.25.3384 . (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 2-Apr-2018.)
statement: orbididc $p |- ( DECID ph -> ( ( ph \/ ( ps <-> ch ) ) <-> ( ( ph \/ ps ) <-> ( ph \/ ch ) ) ) ) $.
